snippet: Some Londoners are up in arms over a New York Times Magazine cover story that offers a grim picture of their city just months ahead of its hosting of the Olympic Games. Lambasting the NYT for peddling out-of-date stereotypes, they claim it is just...
abstract: Some Londoners are up in arms over a New York Times Magazine cover story that offers a grim picture of their city just months ahead of its hosting of the Olympic Games. Lambasting the NYT for peddling out-of-date stereotypes, they claim it is just payback for New York's failure to secure the 2012 Games.

headline.main: Apocalyptic Vision of London Rankles the Locals
